Message:
I will uncover the truth
of the Holy Miracle...
The reason for my
investigation was simple...

It happened moments after
I’d heard the rumor.
Out of nowhere,
Boss appeared before me.
As though I was being
guided by fate!

I’ll bet Boss knows
something about it.
Alright...I’ll try asking him!

“Um... I-I heard a rumor
about the Holy Miracle...

D-Do you happen to know
anything about it, B-Boss...?”

Boss doesn’t know
anything either, huh...
So, there are things
even Boss doesn’t know...

“I...I’ll show you the
Holy Miracle myself, then...!”

Boss smiled at me gently
and said, “I can’t wait,”
before patting me
on the head...

Uuu... He’s treating me
like a kid again...
But, a promise is a promise!

“Then, on the Holy Night,
meet me under
the large tree in
the town square, okay?!”

After that, to help me
uncover the truth
of the Holy Miracle,
I headed out to meet
the perfect witch for the job.
